Adsorption energy E ads of H 2O on LiH for different supercell sizes and levels of theory. Coupled-cluster and MP2 calculations were done using PGTOs only on the top-most layer of the LiH substrate. The fitted lines correspond to 1/ N 2 for the coupled-cluster and MP2 energies and 1/ N 5/4 for the DMC energies. The coupled-cluster and MP2 results employ AV(D,T)Z basis set extrapolation.
80 On the x-axis, N atoms is indicated instead of 1/N atoms.
